metadata.title: Protocol for pooled CRISPR–Cas9 screening in neural organoids and assembloids to study human interneuron generation and migration

annotations.note: The protocol describes a CRISPR–Cas9 screening workflow in neural organoids and assembloids, but lacks specific quantitative details, instrument names, or actionable parameters for transfer, manipulation, or device operation. Key steps involve lentiviral transduction, FACS sorting, organoid generation, and sequencing — all of which require additional experimental context to be fully encoded in HL-IR.
